extensionDescription.message: Protect Singaporeans from phishing websites and email impersonation

warningMessage.message: This website may be impersonating a trusted Singapore company.

safeMessage.message: This is an official website of a trusted Singapore organization.

emailWarningMessage.message: This email may be from a fraudulent source

seekHelp.description: Button text to get more information

protectionActive.description: Status message when protection is enabled

helpText.message: If you believe this is a phishing attempt, do not enter personal information. Report it to the Singapore Police Force Anti-Scam Centre at 1800-722-6688 or via ScamShield app.
